levels.title: Gold
levels.description: Premium membership with maximum visibility and exclusive access to events and networking.
levels.publicity: Featured and permanent banner on the homepage and social media.
benefits: Prominent advertising in newsletters and website.

levels.title: Silver
levels.description: Mid-tier membership with solid benefits in visibility and events.
levels.publicity: Usual mention in the members' section and social media posts.
benefits: Moderate advertising in newsletters and website.
Access to workshops and training sessions.

levels.title: Bronze
levels.description: Basic membership with access to growth opportunities and business support.
levels.publicity: Sometimes in the members' section of the website.

levels.title: NP (Non-Profit)
levels.description: Special membership for non-profit organizations with community support benefits.
levels.publicity: Mention ONLY in corporate social responsibility campaigns.
benefits: Discounts or fee waivers on certain services.
